title: Song - the observation about good fortune

content.question: The observation in the third stanza is that

choices.label: good fortune and bad fortune are equally to be expected in our experience
good fortune has more impact on our lives than bad fortune
good fortune cannot be prolonged, but we help bad fortune to endure
good fortune should be recollected in times of bad fortune

content.answer: good fortune cannot be prolonged, but we help bad fortune to endure

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
